Articles.Content:
Was this here before?-

It seems useless and awkward for this forum.

It was there when I got in. Not really sure where to use it, though; I never used it myself.

Maybe it was vBulletin's standard feature?

It was there when I got in. Not really sure where to use it, though; I never used it myself.

Maybe it was vBulletin's standard feature?

I am pretty sure kerbal smileys are made by squad.
Not the smileys themselves; I meant the standard smiley shapes (smile, sad, laughing, etc.). I assumed Squad looked at these stock smileys and decided to replace it with Kerbal faces.
Been here even before vBulletin. It's been here a very long time.
The smiley's origin aside, I find it weird that a kerbal would have red lips.
Yes, those have been around quite a long time indeed. If I remember correctly, they were made by "Sordid" who was a senior moderator here on the forums for much of KSP's history.
